summary: The client questioned a discrepancy in the project name, which Sarah clarified as a metadata glitch in the sprint summary, confirming 'BrightHR Lite' from the vision document. Sarah then directed the team to proceed with testing the generated app for SP-001 review, focusing on US-006.

decisions.title: Confirm project name as BrightHR Lite
decisions.details: Prioritize vision document over sprint execution summary artifact due to metadata glitch

actions.task: Run `./test-generated-app.command` if not already, then test US-006 (Leave Calendar) at http://localhost:8001/calendar and provide feedback

risks.risk: Metadata glitches in sprint execution summary generation
risks.mitigation: Prioritize vision document for accurate project details in reviews
